name: RhythmslingerVR
description:
Dual-wield magical pistols and shoot with style to your mp3s. Procedural  ⦿ Fast-paced levels from any .mp3
Stylish Shooting ⦿ Recoil your pistols for bonus points Customizable ⦿ Three challenge mods and four difficulties + Get the HTC Vive early release for 25% off, with new guns and mods on the way
